item.title: Ruby Bits Code School
item.dc:creator: chuck@teachmetocode.com (Charles Max Wood)
item.description: Hey everyone! The awesome folks over at Code School are giving their Ruby Bits 1 course away for free to all our listeners. Head on over to rubyrogues.com/rubybits to sign up! And while you’re at it, make sure you give a big shout out to Greg and Dan to thank them via @codeschool for doing it! Thanks!
item.itunes:subtitle: Hey everyone! - The awesome folks over at Code School are giving their Ruby Bits 1 course away for free to all our listeners. Head on over to rubyrogues.com/rubybits to sign up! - And while you're at it,
item.itunes:summary:
Hey everyone!
The awesome folks over at Code School are giving their Ruby Bits 1 course away for free to all our listeners. Head on over to rubyrogues.com/rubybits to sign up!
And while you're at it, make sure you give a big shout out to Greg and Dan to thank them via @codeschool for doing it!
Thanks!
item.itunes:author: Ruby Rogues
